Title: Main Justice
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin (teleplay by), Jon Lovett (story), Alena Smith (staff writer), Aaron Sorkin (story), John Musero (staff writer)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: When the team attends the White House Correspondents' Dinner in Washington, Mac makes an unexpected acquaintance and Will gets a surprise.
